name: Smash Z'em All: Zombie Smash
description:
There are many zombies want to attack the town on Halloween night. Help our boy shoot all zombies and defense his town. Zombie Smash is addicting game to play or fun survival game,
you can finish the mission of each day to survive.
Shoot the zombies to get money and buy weapon, upgrade the barriers, boom. You can use the boom to call the bombers.
